product_name: Outdoor Research Fuzzy Gloves - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Thanks to soft, cozy fleece, the women's Outdoor Research Fuzzy Gloves keep your fingers from feeling frosty in cold weather. Warm fleece construction has a thick pile backing for great comfort. Silicone prints at the fingertips and palms enhance grip. Outdoor Research Fuzzy Gloves feature folded cuffs. Can be worn as liners under shell gloves (not included). Closeout.
short_description: Thanks to soft, cozy fleece, the women's Outdoor Research Fuzzy Gloves keep your fingers from feeling frosty in cold weather.
